thread.title: Heads Roll After Pilots Let Playmate Fly a Plane
thread.title_full: Heads Roll After Pilots Let Playmate Fly a Plane

author: Arden Dier
title: Heads Roll After Pilots Let Playmate Fly a Plane
text: Heads Roll After Pilots Let Playmate Fly a Plane Surprise: Both pilots are now out of a job By Arden Dier , Newser Staff Posted Jun 30, 2015 11:59 AM CDT COMMENTS (37) (Newser) â€“ Two pilots for Argentine carrier Austral Lineas Aereas are out of a job after they acted a little too generously with a passenger who just so happened to be a Playboy model. Victoria Xipolitakis tweeted photos, since removed, showing her sandwiched between pilots Patricio Zocchi Molina, 33, and Federico Matias Soaje, 37, during a recent flight from Buenos Aires to Rosario, Argentina, reports Mashable . But that's not all: In one of six videos Xipolitakis, 29, recorded, a pilot can be heard telling her that she can fly the plane; she claims she flew the aircraft during takeoff. Xipolitakis, who is now banned from the airline for five years, has since apologized. Fox News Latino reports some of the 36 passengers on board are preparing to sue the airline.
